alert.note: Alert for Marion (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 09 at 4:56PM CDT until August 09 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MARION COUNTY... At 456 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hamilton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Haleyville, Lake Buttahatchee, Brinn, Bear Creek, Pearces Mill and Piney Grove. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
